name: Echoing Serenity
description:
Echoing Serenity is a platforming roguelike without stress nor danger. The idea of the game is to relax and enjoy randomly generated surprises, talk to friendly NPCs if you find them, and if you're of the active kind, look for secrets and solve puzzles.

THIS IS AN EARLY ACCESS AND THE GAME IS MISSING MOST OF ITS PLANNED FEATURES.

As for now, the game features an infinite, but very predictable level and a fully playable character (though she doesn't have animations nor VFX yet).

Controls:
Walk: Arrows or WASD
Jump: Space or Z or K
Dash: Shift or X or J or L
